title: 223: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 5 (Everyone’s EXPOSED & Matt is in Love with 183 Women)
itunes:title: 223: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 5 (Everyone’s EXPOSED & Matt is in Love with 183 Women)
description:
It is time to recap the 5th episode of Matt’s season and Jess is joined by her husband Evan (Bekah is a busy queen and will be back on Thursday to chat A LOT of tea)! They discuss the exposing of Anna and Queen Victoria, MJ taking Queen Victoria’s position, Rachael’s 1-on-1, a group date with a farmer (or actor - you decide), Frenchie the Goat being full of wisdom, our thoughts on Kit, Matt’s messy apartment, the producer forced Jessenia vs. MJ, and much more! 


EVAN AMBROSE:

Follow Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

His Real Housewives Recap podcast “House Cats”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/house-cats/id1538372749


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.com and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!

***ARTICLE: Get $50 OFF YOUR FIRST PURCHASE OF $100 OR MORE at ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY
